    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AboutDialog
    Modal “About” dialog for the application.
    AddTaskCommand
    A command that adds a new task to the system.
    App
    Application entry point for launching the Tasks Management Application UI.
    AppTheme
    Provides centralized, immutable theme tokens for the application UI, including dimensions, colors, and fonts.
    AppTheme.AccentCheckBoxIcon
    Minimal accent-colored checkbox icon used to override the default OS check style.
    ByStateCount
    Report data structure that aggregates the number of tasks per TaskState.
    ByStateCsvExporter
    CSV exporter for ByStateCount reports.
    ByStatePlainTextExporter
    Plain text exporter for ByStateCount reports.
    Command
    Represents a reversible application action following the Command pattern.
    CommandException
    Exception type representing errors that occur during command execution or undo.
    CommandStack
    Maintains undo and redo stacks for executed commands.
    CommandStackTest
    JUnit 4 tests for the command stack (execute/undo/redo) used in the tasks management application.
    CompletedTaskRec
    Export record representing a task in the TaskState.Completed state.
    ConfirmExitDialog
    Modal dialog that asks the user to confirm exiting the application.
    ContentArea
    Three-column container composed of LEFT, CENTER, and RIGHT panes.
    ControlPanel
    Left-side control rail presenting five large square actions: Refresh, Add, Edit, Delete, and Disk Cleanup.
    CountByStateVisitor
    Visitor that counts tasks by their TaskState and produces a ByStateCount report.
    CsvFlatTaskVisitor
    Visitor implementation that produces CSV (UTF-8) text output for tasks by visiting ExportNode variants.
    DAOProvider
    Provides centralized access to the application's ITasksDAO.
    DeleteTaskCommand
    Command that deletes a task from the DAO and supports undo by restoring it.
    DerbyBootstrap
    Utility class responsible for booting the embedded Derby database, creating it if necessary, and ensuring that the required schema exists.
    DerbyConfig
    Provides constants and utility methods for configuring the embedded Apache Derby database used by the application.
    EmbeddedDerbyTasksDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) implementation backed by embedded Apache Derby.
    ExportDialog
    Modal dialog for configuring task export (file destination and format).
    ExportDialog.ExportResult
    Result of the export configuration chosen by the user.
    ExportFormat
    Enumeration of file export formats supported by the application.
    ExportNode
    Sealed interface representing exportable task nodes for use in visitors.
    Filters
    Utility class providing ready-made task filters as building blocks for Combinator composition.
    FiltersTest
    JUnit 4 tests for the composable task Filters and the ITaskFilter combinators (AND/OR/NOT/ALL) against the domain model.
    HeaderBar
    Header bar component with a left-aligned application icon and title, and right-aligned pill buttons (About / Close).
    InProgressTaskRec
    Export record representing a task in the TaskState.InProgress state.
    IReportExporter<T>
    Adapter interface for exporting a Report into a textual representation.
    ITask
    Represents a task entity in the system.
    ITaskFilter
    Functional filter over tasks implementing the Combinator pattern.
    ITasksDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) contract for task persistence.
    ITaskVisitor
    Base visitor interface over task export record variants.
    MainFrame
    Borderless main application window that initializes Look invalid input: '&' Feel, wires the MVVM stack (DAO → ViewModel → API), and hosts the root UI including header and content area.
    MarkStateCommand
    Command that changes the lifecycle state of a task.
    MarkStateCommand.TaskFactory
    Factory for producing a new immutable task snapshot with a modified state.
    ObservableList<T>
    Observable list wrapper for UI binding.
    ObservableList.Listener<T>
    Listener notified when the list reference or contents are changed.
    ObserverPropertyTest
    JUnit 4 test suite for the ViewModel observer utilities Property<T> and ObservableList<T>.
    PlainTextFlatTaskVisitor
    Visitor implementation that produces plain-text block output for tasks by visiting ExportNode variants.
    Property<T>
    Observable property implementing the Observer pattern.
    Property.Listener<T>
    Listener interface for observing property changes.
    Report
    Marker interface for all report result types produced by TaskVisitor implementations in the Tasks Management Application.
    RoundedPanel
    A custom JPanel with rounded corners and a configurable background color.
    RowsPropertyAdapter
    Adapter that converts a Property<List<RowDTO>> from the ViewModel into a Property<List<ITask>> suitable for UI widgets.
    SortById
    Sorting strategy that orders tasks by their unique identifier.
    SortByState
    Sorting strategy that orders tasks by their lifecycle state in the sequence: TaskState.ToDo TaskState.InProgress TaskState.Completed
    SortByTitle
    Sorting strategy that orders tasks by their title in case-insensitive lexicographic order.
    SortStrategy
    Defines a strategy interface for sorting collections of ITask.
    StateTransitionTest
    JUnit 4 tests verifying the Task lifecycle transitions (State pattern).
    StrategyTest
    JUnit 4 tests for sorting strategies: SortById (ascending by id), SortByTitle (case-insensitive lexicographic order), and SortByState (ToDo < InProgress < Completed).
    Task
    Task entity with immutable identity (id), validated fields, and a behavioral state managed by the TaskState state machine.
    TaskDaoTest
    JUnit 4 CRUD tests for EmbeddedDerbyTasksDAO.
    TaskDetailsDialog
    Modal dialog that presents task details in a read-only, presentation-only view.
    TaskEditorDialog
    Modal dialog for creating or editing a task.
    TaskEditorDialog.EditorResult
    Result returned when the user confirms.
    TaskEditorDialog.Mode
    Mode of the editor.
    TaskEditorDialog.Prefill
    Initial values for edit mode.
    TasksDAOException
    Exception type for persistence and DAO-related errors specific to the Tasks Management Application.
    TasksPanel
    Scrollable list of tasks with a sticky header, bound to a TasksViewAPI.
    TaskState
    Task lifecycle states implemented as a behavioral enum (State pattern).
    TasksViewAPI
    UI-facing abstraction over the TasksViewModel.
    TasksViewApiAdapter
    Adapter that bridges the UI-facing TasksViewAPI to the TasksViewModel.
    TasksViewModel
    ViewModel layer (MVVM) for managing tasks.
    TasksViewModel.RowDTO
    Immutable UI row data transfer object.
    TaskVisitor
    Visitor interface required by the project (see Requirements.md).
    ToDoTaskRec
    Export record representing a task in the TaskState.ToDo state.
    ToolBox
    A right-side toolbox composed of six sections (Undo/Redo, Advance/Mark, Sort, Filter, Counters, Export).
    ToolBox.ExportHandler
    Handles exporting tasks according to user choices.
    ToolBox.IdsProvider
    Supplies currently selected task IDs.
    UiTaskProxy
    UI-side proxy that implements ITask and mirrors a single TasksViewModel.RowDTO published by the TasksViewModel.
    UiUtils
    Swing utilities for styling widgets in a consistent, theme-aware way.
    UiUtils.RoundedMatteShadowBorder
    Rounded matte border with a soft bottom shadow (no external libraries).
    UpdateTaskCommand
    Command that updates an existing task to a new snapshot.
    ValidationException
    Exception thrown to indicate validation errors in the domain layer.
    ViewModelException
    Exception type for errors that occur in the ViewModel layer.
    VisitorReportTest
    JUnit 4 tests for the visitor-based reporting and exporting features.
    WindowChrome
    Utility methods for borderless windows with rounded corners and drag handling.
